product_name: Royal Robbins Cool Mesh Shirt Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Traveling to hot, humid climates? Carry the women's all-cotton Cool Mesh Shirt Jacket from Royal Robbins. It dries fast, resists wrinkles and offers natural-fiber breathability and comfort. Airy cotton and organic cotton blend offers breathable comfort even in hot, humid weather; prewashed for softness. Open-mesh construction allows the jacket to dry fast and resist wrinkles. Sleeves can be rolled up and secured with coconut-button tabs; 4 button-secured pockets stow small items. Royal Robbins Cool Mesh Shirt Jacket for women features a full-button front and removable tie belt. 28 in. back length. Closeout.
short_description: Traveling to hot, humid climates? Carry the women's all-cotton Cool Mesh Shirt Jacket from Royal Robbins. It dries fast, resists wrinkles and offers natural-fiber breathability and comfort.
